title: 关于某so函数的加解密，以及自修复
slug: 关于某so函数的加解密，以及自修复
path: api/articles/关于某so函数的加解密，以及自修复.json
content:
前言：

意外在看雪上看到一道题，感觉挺不错的，就自己手动复现了下

分析过程

0x01 脱壳

这里使用jeb打开后，发现qihoo的字样，明显是数字壳，这里没使用fart去脱，因为我手机目前没刷机，习惯dexdump，膜葫芦娃大哥2333，这里使用objection加载dexdump插件的方式，挺方便的，至于使用方法，见github，全记上面了，基本就是加载插件，然后plugin dexdump search，plugin dexdump dump，有可能会报错，最近肉丝也发了这个问题的解答，其实就是dexdump暴力搜索时，发现并不是真正的dex，所以才会崩溃，可以无视，脱完，再用jeb打开就行

0x02 核心逻辑分析

用jeb打开后，发现核心的判断函数是一个jni函数，拿出ida，将so打开，按照静态注册方法名搜索，发现并没有找到，说明是动态注册了，直接找JNI_Onload

 这里我就不跟进去了，其实就是动态注册，不过呢，一些参数都被加密了，我ctrl+s看了下段，果然有个.init_array段，并且里面有操作的

好家伙，全是异或，我尝试用idapython进行手动patch，真的麻烦，不过这些参数解密后还是很直观的，作用也挺大

![image-20210327011018899](/Users/mac/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20210327011018899.png)

这里算是patch的一部分了，还是挺不错的，接下来看那个动态注册的jni函数，

![image-20210327011203804](/Users/mac/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20210327011203804.png)

![image-20210327011225526](/Users/mac/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20210327011225526.png)

发现什么呢，其实就是so函数级的加解密，如果对这个流程不熟悉和elf文件结构不熟，那么恭喜你，会一脸懵逼，我之前看小黄书的时候，还有印象，基本就是查看内存空间，然后通过字符串操作，取出so加载基地址，然后通过程序头表，找到dym段偏移，跟到实际的dym段，因为dym段其实就一个结构体数组，这个结构体包括了dymstr，dymsym.的相对虚拟地址，然后通过.hash段来计算函数名的hash，查找dymsym中函数结构体，取出函数偏移和大小

然后就是对ooxx函数进行解密了，改变内存的可读，使其可写，改变完还是需要改变回去的

![image-20210327012214500](/Users/mac/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20210327012214500.png)

我们发现其实逻辑很简单，就是异或了一组数组，用frida直接dump下来，本地修复就完事了

function main()
{
    var soModule=Process.findModuleByName("libnative-lib.so");
    var keyadd=ptr(Number(soModule.base)+0x1C180);
    
    
    console.log(keyadd.readByteArray(464))
    // for(var i =0;i<486;i++)
    // {
    //     keyadd=keyadd+i;
    //     console.log(keyadd.;
    // }
}

setImmediate(main);

修复的脚本：

import mmap

key=[0x00,0x01,0x02,0x03,0x04,0x05,0x06,0x07,0x08,0x09,0x0a,0x0b,0x0c,0x0d,0x0e,0x0f,
0x10,0x11,0x12,0x13,0x14,0x15,0x16,0x17,0x18,0x19,0x1a,0x1b,0x1c,0x1d,0x1e,0x1f,
0x20,0x21,0x22,0x23,0x24,0x25,0x26,0x27,0x28,0x29,0x2a,0x2b,0x2c,0x2d,0x2e,0x2f,
0x30,0x31,0x32,0x33,0x34,0x35,0x36,0x37,0x38,0x39,0x3a,0x3b,0x3c,0x3d,0x3e,0x3f,

0x60,0x61,0x62,0x63,0x64,0x65,0x66,0x67,0x68,0x69,0x6a,0x6b,0x6c,0x6d,0x6e,0x6f,

0x80,0x81,0x82,0x83,0x84,0x85,0x86,0x87,0x88,0x89,0x8a,0x8b,0x8c,0x8d,0x8e,0x8f,
0x90,0x91,0x92,0x93,0x94,0x95,0x96,0x97,0x98,0x99,0x9a,0x9b,0x9c,0x9d,0x9e,0x9f,
0xa0,0xa1,0xa2,0xa3,0xa4,0xa5,0xa6,0xa7,0xa8,0xa9,0xaa,0xab,0xac,0xad,0xae,0xaf,
0xb0,0xb1,0xb2,0xb3,0xb4,0xb5,0xb6,0xb7,0xb8,0xb9,0xba,0xbb,0xbc,0xbd,0xbe,0xbf,
0xc0,0xc1,0xc2,0xc3,0xc4,0xc5,0xc6,0xc7,0xc8,0xc9,0xca,0xcb,0xcc,0xcd,0xce,0xcf,
0xd0,0xd1,0xd2,0xd3,0xd4,0xd5,0xd6,0xd7,0xd8,0xd9,0xda,0xdb,0xdc,0xdd,0xde,0xdf,
0xe0,0xe1,0xe2,0xe3,0xe4,0xe5,0xe6,0xe7,0xe8,0xe9,0xea,0xeb,0xec,0xed,0xee,0xef,
0xf0,0xf1,0xf2,0xf3,0xf4,0xf5,0xf6,0xf7,0xf8,0xf9,0xfa,0xfb,0xfc,0xfd,0xfe,0xff,
0x00,0x01,0x02,0x03,0x04,0x05,0x06,0x07,0x08,0x09,0x0a,0x0b,0x0c,0x0d,0x0e,0x0f,
0x10,0x11,0x12,0x13,0x14,0x15,0x16,0x17,0x18,0x19,0x1a,0x1b,0x1c,0x1d,0x1e,0x1f,
0x20,0x21,0x22,0x23,0x24,0x25,0x26,0x27,0x28,0x29,0x2a,0x2b,0x2c,0x2d,0x2e,0x2f,
0x30,0x31,0x32,0x33,0x34,0x35,0x36,0x37,0x38,0x39,0x3a,0x3b,0x3c,0x3d,0x3e,0x3f,
0x40,0x41,0x42,0x43,0x44,0x45,0x46,0x47,0x48,0x49,0x4a,0x4b,0x4c,0x4d,0x4e,0x4f,
0x50,0x51,0x52,0x53,0x54,0x55,0x56,0x57,0x58,0x59,0x5a,0x5b,0x5c,0x5d,0x5e,0x5f,
0x60,0x61,0x62,0x63,0x64,0x65,0x66,0x67,0x68,0x69,0x6a,0x6b,0x6c,0x6d,0x6e,0x6f,
0x70,0x71,0x72,0x73,0x74,0x75,0x76,0x77,0x78,0x79,0x7a,0x7b,0x7c,0x7d,0x7e,0x7f,
0x80,0x81,0x82,0x83,0x84,0x85,0x86,0x87,0x88,0x89,0x8a,0x8b,0x8c,0x8d,0x8e,0x8f,
0x90,0x91,0x92,0x93,0x94,0x95,0x96,0x97,0x98,0x99,0x9a,0x9b,0x9c,0x9d,0x9e,0x9f,
0xa0,0xa1,0xa2,0xa3,0xa4,0xa5,0xa6,0xa7,0xa8,0xa9,0xaa,0xab,0xac,0xad,0xae,0xaf,
0xb0,0xb1,0xb2,0xb3,0xb4,0xb5,0xb6,0xb7,0xb8,0xb9,0xba,0xbb,0xbc,0xbd,0xbe,0xbf,
0xc0,0xc1,0xc2,0xc3,0xc4,0xc5,0xc6,0xc7,0xc8,0xc9,0xca,0xcb,0xcc,0xcd,0xce,0xcf]

file_name="libnative-lib.so"
print("repair begin))")
with open(file_name,"r+b") as file_descriptor:
    memory_map=mmap.mmap(file_descriptor.fileno(),0)
    fuc_offest=0x8dc5
    fuc_size=584
    begin_funcc=fuc_offest+59
    end_funncc=fuc_offest+fuc_size-61
    size=end_funncc-begin_funcc
    for i in range(size):
        orginal_byte=int.from_bytes(memory_map[begin_funcc+i:begin_funcc+i+1],"little")
        new_byte=orginal_byte^key[i]
        memory_map[begin_funcc+i:begin_funcc+i+1]=bytes([new_byte])
        read_modified_byte = int.from_bytes(memory_map[begin_funcc + i:begin_funcc + i + 1], "little")
        print("i: %d, original_byte: 0x%02x, modified_byte: 0x%02x, read_modified_byte: 0x%02x"% (i, orginal_byte, new_byte,read_modified_byte))
    memory_map.flush()
    memory_map.close()
print("repair end!")
